entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @VP @WhiteHouse Trump delayed testing for Covid-19 by 7 weeks waiting for his miracle cure in direct opposition to his intelligence community and medical experts. Trump has completely dropped the ball in his response to this pandemic and should resign.
